summary: I have listed all of the mods I use in the most simple and short way possible. This file also includes my personal ENB tweaks to the LIVO ENB.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#f4f4f4][font=Georgia][size=5][b][i]So, before I start, let me tell you a couple of things
[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[list=1]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]Use "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/]Mod Organizer[/url]﻿". Please, just use it. Nexus Mod Manager can corrupt your game and the files resulting in a huge mess.[/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]No, I did not link most of the mods, please do not ask me to.[/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]This list is intended for the sole purpose of making one's game look exactly like mine, that means that this list changes as my load order changes.[/color]
[/list]
[color=#f4f4f4]===============================================================[/color][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][color=#00ff00]Green information within parentheses is information about an optional file you'll need or the type of main file you'll need.
[/color][color=#00ffff]Blue mod names indicate mods that are optional, check out the mod page and see if it interests you.[/color]
[color=#d9d2e9]Mods with an asterisk (*) beside them lets you know that there is longer special installation instructions noted later on in the "Special Instructions" section.
[/color]"amb" stands for "aMidianBorn Book of Silence"

[color=#f4f4f4]===============================================================[/color]

[b][font=Georgia][size=5][i]Mods List...[/i][/size][/font]

[/b][b][u][center][/center][/u][/b][center][b][u][size=3]﻿[color=#f6b26b]Water[/color][/size][/u][/b][/center][center][size=2]Realistic Water Two[color=#00ff00](and optional ENB textures)
[/color]Water Color for Realistic Water Two
Transparent Wave Spray
Pure Waters - Waterfalls[/size][/center]

[color=#f4f4f4]No More Ugly Vines

Verdant(*)

True Storms(*)

Pure Weather

===============================================================[/color]

[b][font=Georgia][size=5][i]Special Installation Instructions...[/i][/size][/font][/b]

[list]
[*][color=#00ffff]Pretty Jump Animations[/color] - Style 2 from installer.
[*][b][color=#00ffff]Unique Grasses and Ground covers[/color][/b] - In the installer, get the no roads option.
[*][b][color=#00ffff]ELFX[/color][/b] - Do NOT get anything from the installer. You are only using the base plugin.
[*][color=#00ffff][b]Verdant[/b][/color] - In your Skyrim.ini, set iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15 and iMinGrassSize from 120(performance) down to 60(dense).
[*][b][color=#00ffff]True Storms[/color][/b] - In the installer, get the patch for Pure Weather.
[/list]
===============================================================

My tweaked LIVO ENB that I use is available in this file's downloads page.
[i][color=#00ff00]Credits to the original author for their AMAZING enb. Link to original mod:[/color][/i] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87943/]LINK[/url]﻿

===============================================================

[b][font=Georgia][size=5][i]Load Order...[/i][/size][/font][/b]

[list=1]
[*][size=2]Misc. Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]UI/HUD Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]Bug/Crash Fixes & Performance Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]Gameplay and Immersion Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]Combat Overhauls[/size]
[*][size=2]Weather & Lighting[/size]
[*][size=2]Animals and Creatures[/size]
[*][size=2]NPC Overhauls[/size]
[*][size=2]Armors & Weapons[/size]
[*][size=2]Outfits[/size]
[*][size=2]Body/Skin[/size]
[*][size=2]Water Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]World Textures[/size]
[*][size=2]Clutter[/size]
[*][size=2]Flora Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]Tattoos, Makeup, etc.[/size]
[*][size=2]Eye, Brow, Hair Mods[/size]
[*][size=2]Audio & FX[/size]
[*][size=2]Physics and Animations[/size]
[/list]
[b][i][font=Georgia]Feel free to ask questions in the comments. I will try to help you as much as I can.[/font][/i][/b]
author: wnisewond
